price: 43. Ma aanu soo dirin adiga hortaa (Nabi Muxammadow) waxaan ahayn rag aan u waxyoonno (oo ma soo dirin malaa’ig). Ee weydiiya ehlu Dikirka (yaqaan Towraadda iyo Injiilka), haddaydaan ogeyn.
arabic: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ إِلَّا رِجَالٗا نُّوحِيٓ إِلَيۡهِمۡۖ فَسۡـَٔلُوٓاْ أَهۡلَ ٱلذِّكۡرِ إِن كُنتُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā arsalnā min qablika illā rijālan nūḥī ilayhim fasalū ahla al-dhik'ri in kuntum lā taʿlamūna
